forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 83, with temperatures falling to around 80 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 52, with temperatures rising to around 55 overnight. West wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 8am. Partly sunny, with a high near 67. West northwest wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 48. Southwest wind 1 to 6 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
